> =A0
> "I am not the orginal Megatron, but I reason just as good. First yo=
u must have a proper body, and I shall craft and form it myself. COme, it w=
ill not do for you to remain so unguarded such as you are," the Decepticon =
stated, raising his arm to guide the spark back to the medical bay. At this=
 stage he could easily modify the intermediate body already under construct=
ion to something she would like.
> =A0
> "It has been a long time since I h=
ad someone near I could trust," he stated, accessing the console and began =
actively changing the sparkless body to what would be the physical manifest=
ation of the spark.
> 
> 

The fiery spark followed to the Med Bay, amazing=
 how it could last so long without a form but there was a determination, so=
mething unique about this spark. 

In the med bay, the form, nothing more t=
han a jumbled mess of metal and parts was coming along well enough. The spa=
rk hovered over the form as though inspecting it. Silent for now as speakin=
g too so much energy, drawing that energy from it's surroundings in order t=
o manifest. 
As it hovered over the face, distorted and incomplete, like a =
human skull without skin or muscle. a slight movement the spark shifted to =
hover over the torso before it shot into and disappearing into the torso. A=
 humming pulse as a bright glow eminated from the upper torso of the incomp=
lete form. 

She awaited for the new body to be completed. Ready for action=
, ready for life.
